location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is acknowledging the commands of the Bombay Government dated 24 May 1811, respecting the payment of arrears on the account of the pension to Mahomed Neuben Khaun [Muḥammad Nabī Khān].
